description: Permissive-hold behavior: when another key is pressed while holding a tap-hold key, the tap-hold key should trigger hold action even if released before threshold. This tests the permissive-hold feature.
expected_behavior: CapsLock should trigger hold action because another key (A) was pressed while holding, even though CapsLock was released before typical threshold
test_config: Requires CapsLock configured as tap-hold with permissive-hold enabled
